name: Ronald Reagan
abortion_text: ['We should rise above bitterness and reproach, and if Americans could come together in a spirit of understanding and helping, then we could find positive solutions to the tragedy of abortion.']

name: Ronald Reagan
abortion_text: ['The question of abortion grips our nation.', 'It is a terrible irony that while some turn to abortion, so many others who cannot become parents cry out for children to adopt.']

name: Ronald Reagan
abortion_text: ['Tonight, I call America-a good nation, a moral people-to charitable but realistic consideration of the terrible cost of abortion on demand.', 'Let us unite as a nation and protect the unborn with legislation that would stop all Federal funding for abortion and with a human life amendment making, of course, an exception where the unborn child threatens the life of the mother.']

name: George W Bush
abortion_text: ['I ask you to protect infants at the very hour of their birth and end the practice of partial-birth abortion.']

name: George W Bush
abortion_text: ['There are fewer abortions in America than at any point in the last three decades, and the number of children born to teenage mothers has been falling for a dozen years in a row.']

name: Barack Obama
abortion_text: ["We still may not agree on a woman's right to choose, but surely we can agree it's a good thing that teen pregnancies and abortions are nearing all-time lows, and that every woman should have access to the health care she needs."]

name: Donald J Trump
abortion_text: ["To defend the dignity of every person, I am asking the Congress to pass legislation to prohibit the late-term abortion of children who can feel pain in the mother's womb."]

name: Donald J Trump
abortion_text: ['That is also why I am calling upon the Members of Congress here tonight to pass legislation finally banning the late-term abortion of babies.']

name: Joseph R Biden
abortion_text: ['But already, more than a dozen States are enforcing extreme abortion bans.']
